pageProduct.name: Avene Soothing Radiance Mask 50ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Avène Soothing Radiance Mask helps restore the natural beauty of even the most sensitive skin. A genuine Avène Thermal Spring Water home treatment to intensely nourish, hydrate and strengthen the skin barrier.
The new antioxidant Natural Berry Extract instantly delivers lipids to rebuild and strengthen the skin barrier so it’s able to maintain effective hydration and restore skin’s natural balance.
The skin is protected against external aggressors including free radicals, thanks to the antioxidant properties of Natural Berry Extract combined with Pre-tocopheryl, a Vitamin E precursor. Formulated with ingredients of plant origin and enhanced with Avène Thermal Spring Water, skin is deeply moisturised, radiant and signs of fatigue fade for a healthy, glowing complexion.
The cocoon-like texture is rich in Avène Thermal Spring Water and hydro-nourishing active ingredients to soothe and repair the skin barrier during your weekly pampering. Tired skin is refreshed, radiant and intensely replenished. Formulated to minimise the risk of allergic reaction, non-comedogenic and paraben free.
Apply in a thick layer to the face and neck. Leave on for 10 to 15 minutes. Gently remove excess product with a cotton pad. No rinse needed.

Common Uses

Specific / Complementary care FACE For dehydrated and weakened sensitive skin

Ingredients

AVÈNE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA)*. MINERAL OIL (PARAFFINUM LIQUIDUM). CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE. WATER (AQUA). CARTHAMUS TINCTORIUS (SAFFLOWER) SEED OIL (CARTHAMUM TINCTORIUS SEED OIL). PLAMITIC ACID. STEARIC ACID. HYDROGENATED PALM/PALM KERNALOIL PEG-6 ESTERS. TRIETHANOLAMINE. GLYCERYL STEARATE. MICROCRYSTALLINE WAX (CERA MICROCRISTALLINA). PEG-100 STEARATE. PROPYLENE GLYCOL. 1,2-HEXANEDIOL. CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC GLYCERIDES. CAPRYLYL CLYCOL. CARBOMER. DISODIUM EDTA. FRAGRANCE (PARFUM). PHENYL TRIMETHICONE. RIBES RUBRYM (CURRANT) FRUIT EXTRACT (RIBES RUBRUM FRUIT EXTRACT)*. RUBIS IDAEUS (RASPBERRY) FRUIT EXTRACT (RUBIS IDAEUS FRUIT EXTRACT)*. SODIUM BENZOATE. TOCOPHERYL GLUCOSIDE. VACCINIUM MYRTILLUS FRUIT EXTRACT*. *NATURAL INGREDIENTS

Directions

Apply in a thick layer to the face and neck. Leave on for 10 to 15 minutes. Gently remove excess product with a cotton pad. No rinse needed. Finish by spraying a fine mist of Avène Thermal Spring Water.
